text.__SUMMARY__: Habenaria nigrescens is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is found in Cameroon and Nigeria. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical high-altitude grassland. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Pollard, B.J. & Darbyshire, I. (2004). "Habenaria nigrescens". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2004: e.T46361A11051410. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2004.RLTS.T46361A11051410.en. Retrieved 20 December 2017.
